channel.title: [Help]~ add admin / mod
channel.description:
Hello, can some one help me with the command called (::givemod / ::giveadmin)
and i wants is so only ; Yorchi and Mindblaster7 can make that command. Thanks ^^

item.title: [Help]~ add admin / mod
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“godsword pk pure, post:22, topic:264778”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=349596.msg2687185#msg2687185 date=1235750447]

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
I’m not telling you where to put it because your a noob.
[/quote]

This wasnt leeched from Reapagescape…At all was it…[/quote]Nope, just a old base I downloaded and it was found, and Reapagescape must of leeched the makers because I’m 100% sure gangsterscape made them. Thanks for trying tho.

Read full topic

I’m not telling you where to put it because your a noob.[/quote]

This wasnt leeched from Reapagescape…At all was it…

item.title: [Help]~ add admin / mod
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“hybrid_newbie, post:20, topic:264778”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=349596.msg2687985#msg2687985 date=1235789205]
That statement does not defeat the purpose of the forums. The forums were created so that members could learn from it. As Chassy stated, these questions have been asked numerous times, and the answer can be found using the search bar.
[/quote]

I understand, and certainly, that could be irritating for people who are here to help people with less common problems - but it is surely worth pointing the asker to the right page as well as recommending the search bar next time?
For someone that may be new to MS and private game servers in general, the terminology for their question might be unbeknown to them. Maybe, in the least, tell them what they’re trying to say in a way that will make it searchable:

[i]You’re looking to code the ::givemod and ::giveadmin commands into your server source.

Please use the search bar for this type of question in future, but you can find the block of code you need here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,253184.0.html[/i]

That’s all I suggest.[/quote]
Alright; that’s fair. I agree.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]~ add admin / mod
item.dc:creator: @hybrid_newbie hybrid_newbie
item.description:
@hybrid_newbie wrote:

jc22493:

That statement does not defeat the purpose of the forums. The forums were created so that members could learn from it. As Chassy stated, these questions have been asked numerous times, and the answer can be found using the search bar.

I understand, and certainly, that could be irritating for people who are here to help people with less common problems - but it is surely worth pointing the asker to the right page as well as recommending the search bar next time?
For someone that may be new to MS and private game servers in general, the terminology for their question might be unbeknown to them. Maybe, in the least, tell them what they’re trying to say in a way that will make it searchable:

[i]You’re looking to code the ::givemod and ::giveadmin commands into your server source.

Please use the search bar for this type of question in future, but you can find the block of code you need here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,253184.0.html[/i]

That’s all I suggest.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]~ add admin / mod
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“hybrid_newbie, post:18, topic:264778”][quote author=rash link=topic=349596.msg2687164#msg2687164 date=1235749737]

Use the search bar.

people dont understnad that sentence
[/quote]

Now I’m sorry, it might only be my first ever post, so please do forgive me and point out if I am so terribly misguided when I missed the bit in the forum rules that gave “senior members” and upwards the explicit right to be so self-important as to look down on other members in this way?
I’ve seen this so many-a-time in forums, and it kind of hacks me off.

Also, on undoubtedly more controversial matters, while I’m here to make a presence of myself:

This isn’t a spoon-feeding community. Read the rules, buddy. When a question is asked repeatedly at least 10 times a day, I think people can find it by searching instead of being lazy.

Does this statement (and also the rule) not defeat only the entire purpose of this support forum (and specifically, this section)? It’s probably not beyond people’s capability to try do a Google search (and it is usually the case that they have to no avail before posting anyway).
But if everyone who knows a relatively simple answer is telling them to Google it, who’s actually going to give it to them? Google??
In my opinion, it is far easier just to show them where to read the information - it’d use the same energy as copy & pasting an unhelpful message![/quote]
That statement does not defeat the purpose of the forums. The forums were created so that members could learn from it. As Chassy stated, these questions have been asked numerous times, and the answer can be found using the search bar.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]~ add admin / mod
item.dc:creator: @hybrid_newbie hybrid_newbie
item.description:
@hybrid_newbie wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:6, topic:264778”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=349596.msg2687141#msg2687141 date=1235748506]
Use the search bar.
[/quote]

people dont understnad that sentence[/quote]

Now I’m sorry, it might only be my first ever post, so please do forgive me and point out if I am so terribly misguided when I missed the bit in the forum rules that gave “senior members” and upwards the explicit right to be so self-important as to look down on other members in this way?
I’ve seen this so many-a-time in forums, and it kind of hacks me off.

Also, on undoubtedly more controversial matters, while I’m here to make a presence of myself:

Chassy13:

This isn’t a spoon-feeding community. Read the rules, buddy. When a question is asked repeatedly at least 10 times a day, I think people can find it by searching instead of being lazy.

Does this statement (and also the rule) not defeat only the entire purpose of this support forum (and specifically, this section)? It’s probably not beyond people’s capability to try do a Google search (and it is usually the case that they have to no avail before posting anyway).
But if everyone who knows a relatively simple answer is telling them to Google it, who’s actually going to give it to them? Google??
In my opinion, it is far easier just to show them where to read the information - it’d use the same energy as copy & pasting an unhelpful message!

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]~ add admin / mod
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
I’m not telling you where to put it because your a noob.

Read full topic
